Module fr.umontpellier.polytech.ig.colocalternant
Package fr.umontpellier.polytech.ig.colocalternant

Class FXRouter

java.lang.Object
fr.umontpellier.polytech.ig.colocalternant.FXRouter
public final class FXRouter extends Object
FXRouter allows to manage scenes switching on JavaFX Application with an easy API Inspired by Angular JS $routeProvider
